label: Green Line: Shuttle buses (North Station ↔ Union Square)
short_description: Track work requiring shuttle replacement service between North Station and Union Square during peak hours.
default_actions: Deploy shuttle buses between North Station and Union Square
Post real-time signage alerts at all affected stations
Advise riders toward Orange Line as alternative route

label: Red Line: Signal problem (Harvard ↔ Central)
short_description: Signal failure causing 15-20 minute delays between Harvard and Central Square during peak hours.
default_actions: Run express trains where possible through unaffected segments
Stage a spare train at Alewife for quick deployment
Send targeted push alerts to riders boarding north of Harvard

label: Orange Line: Partial closure with shuttle buses
short_description: Partial Orange Line closure between Ruggles and Back Bay with shuttle bus replacement due to infrastructure work.
default_actions: Run high-frequency shuttle buses between Ruggles and Back Bay
Coordinate with traffic police for shuttle routing priority
Advise riders to transfer to Commuter Rail at Back Bay where possible

label: Route 1: Mass Ave detour due to roadwork
short_description: Route 1 buses detoured off Massachusetts Avenue due to emergency roadwork, adding 10-15 minutes and skipping several stops.
default_actions: Post stop-specific detour alerts at all affected stops
Update trip planner and real-time info to reflect skipped stops
Recommend riders use nearby parallel routes (CT1, 47)

label: Blue Line: Disabled train at Aquarium
short_description: Disabled train at Aquarium station causing service delays and single-tracking between Government Center and Airport.
default_actions: Deploy tow equipment to remove disabled train
Alert riders to expect 20+ minute delays, suggest Green/Orange alternatives
